headline: If You Own AES Stock, Take a Look at This Instead
summary: AES has plenty of gigawatts, but Applied Digital knows how to maximize the value of its energy production.

headline: Assessing AES (AES) Valuation After Recent Choppy Trading And Renewed Investor Attention
summary: AES (AES) has been drawing renewed attention after recent trading moves, prompting investors to recheck how its utility operations and current valuation line up with the stock’s mixed short and longer term return profile. See our latest analysis for AES. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 3.0% one day share price decline at US$14.45, offset by a 4.3% 1 month share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 23.7% contrasts with weaker 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns,...

headline: What AES (AES)'s Panama Antitrust Lawsuit Could Mean For Shareholders
summary: In early January 2026, Panamanian firms Sinolam LNG Terminal and Sinolam Smarter Energy LNG Power filed a civil lawsuit in Virginia accusing AES and partners of a multi‑year scheme to block their LNG‑to‑power projects in Panama, seeking more than US$4.00 billion in damages. The complaint not only alleges coercive tactics and misuse of confidential information, but also claims AES leveraged government ties to secure effective monopoly control over Panama’s LNG import, storage, regasification,...
